DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients age 18 . 2 . Patients diagnose thoracic abdominal aortic aneurysm indication surgical treatment ( diameter > 30 mm < 50 mm ) . 3 . Patients accept sign specific inform consent . 1 . Unstable coronary artery disease . 2 . Congenital heart disease . 3 . Any evolve infectious syndrome viral infection ( HIV , HBV HCV ) . 4 . Any chronic inflammatory autoimmune disease . 5 . Prior administration GCSF ; EPO ; GMCSF . 6 . Liver failure . 7 . Prior oncologic disease ongoing cancer life expectancy < 1 year . 8 . Dementia . 9 . Pregnancy . 10 . Patients age < 18 .
